title: Enhancing Clinical Practice Competencies: Analyzing Educational Technology and Instructional Design Using Text Mining

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze keywords and abstracts of educational research papers using text-mining tools.
Learners can interpret clustering patterns of educational technology trends based on analytical results.
Learners can compare how instructional design principles are applied across diverse educational fields (e.g., distance education, programming education, language education).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
